name: Sent a new Notifications with Poster
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for send new notification with poster

Request payload must contain the following fields:

title: STRING
message: STRING
target_audience: STRING, options:
notification_type: STRING, options:
status: STIRNG, options:
Image: FILE

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/notifications/sendwithposter

formdata

Response:

200 - OK 

  {"status":200,"status_type":"success","message":"OK","count":1,"data":[{"created_at":"2022-09-11T16:26:56.573Z","updated_at":"2022-09-11T16:26:56.573Z","image":null,"read_by":null,"updated_by":null,"notification_id":39,"title":"My Notification","message":"This is a test notification","target_audience":"ALL","notification_type":"PUSH","status":"PUBLISHED","created_by":40}]}
